Earthdigger was a wizard member of the Flaming Fist who served the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Fist Earthdigger was a fair-skinned human man with blue eyes, mousy-blonde facial hair, and disheveled haircut. He wore a dark red robe of a Flaming Fist mage and was armed with a quarterstaff.
In the , Fist Earthdigger was stationed in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate, within the Wyrms Crossing fortress.
